mapper.select: SELECT p.PATIENTNAME "patientName", p.PATIENTSEX "patientSex", MONTHS_BETWEEN(TRUNC(SYSDATE,'YEAR'), TRUNC(p.PATIENTBIRTH,'YEAR') ) /12 +1 "patientBirth", p.PATIENTADDR "patientAddr", TO_CHAR(s.SERVICEDATE,'YYYY/MM/DD') "serviceDate", s.SERVICENO "serviceNo" FROM PATIENT p, SERVICEAPPLY s WHERE p.PATIENTNO = s.PATIENTNO AND s.SERVICESTATUS = 'S04' AND s.HELPERNO = #{helperNo}

SELECT p.PATIENTNAME "patientName", p.PATIENTSEX "patientSex", MONTHS_BETWEEN(TRUNC(SYSDATE,'YEAR'), TRUNC(p.PATIENTBIRTH,'YEAR') ) /12 +1 "patientBirth", p.PATIENTADDR "patientAddr", p.PATIENTMEDICATION "patientMedication", p.PATIENTBLOOD "patientBlood", p.PATIENTDISEASE "patientDisease", p.PATIENTGRADE "patientGrade", TO_CHAR(s.SERVICEDATE,'YYYY/MM/DD') "serviceDate", s.SERVICESTARTTIME "serviceStartTime", s.SERVICEENDTIME "serviceEndTime", s.HELPERPRICE "helperPrice", s.SERVICEDEMAND "serviceDemand", s.SERVICENO "serviceNo", h.REALSTARTTIME "realStartTime", h.REALENDTIME "realEndTime" FROM PATIENT p, SERVICEAPPLY s, SERVICEHISTORY h WHERE p.PATIENTNO = s.PATIENTNO AND s.SERVICENO = h.SERVICENO(+) AND s.SERVICENO = #{value}
